name: Treasure Digger:Miner!
description:
Casual mining game and a great time killer.
• Easy to play and funny digging game.
• Just Tap Tap to dig large amount of minerals.
• Earn materials and upgrade you digging equipment.
• Classical and simple mining game.
• Auto Digging and release your hands

Join us to become a Mining Master.

If you have any questions, plz contact us: plumbatheana11441@gmail.com
